explains: n. 葡萄树；葡萄藤；小道消息；秘密情报网

sentences.en: I heard on the grapevine that you're leaving.
sentences.cn: 我听小道消息说你要离开。

sentences.en: No sooner had he reached the grapevine than--crack!
I had heard through the grapevine that he was quite critical of what we were doing.
sentences.cn: 我已经私下听说他对我们的工作十分挑剔。
